channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Perfecto Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Perfecto Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2260|2024-08-04T07:01:41.195Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20perfecto%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Perfecto Plugin 1.17 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-2261|2024-08-04T07:01:41.175Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20perfecto%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Perfecto Plugin 1.17 and earlier executes a command on the Jenkins controller, allowing attackers with Job/Configure permission to run arbitrary commands on the Jenkins controller
